subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: UConn’s vulnerabilities will be up for examination Monday night when the Huskies face No. 3 North Carolina in a nationally televised game at Gampel Pavilion in Storrs.
snippet: UConn’s vulnerabilities will be up for examination Monday night when the Huskies face No. 3 North Carolina in a nationally televised game at Gampel Pavilion in Storrs.
